SEARCH
Package appDomain.util

Class Utility

java.lang.Object
appDomain.util.Utility
public class Utility extends Object
Provides sorting algorithms for Shape arrays. This utility class contains implementations of various sorting algorithms that can be used to sort arrays of Shape objects based on their height, volume, or base area.

  • Method Details

    • bubbleSort

      public static Shape[] bubbleSort(Shape[] shapes, char unitType)
      Sorts an array of shapes using the bubble sort algorithm. This method implements the bubble sort algorithm to sort the shapes in descending order based on the specified property (height, volume, or base area).
      Parameters:
      shapes - The array of Shape objects to sort
      unitType - The property to sort by (h=height, v=volume, a=base area)
      Returns:
      The sorted array of Shape objects

    • insertionSort

      public static Shape[] insertionSort(Shape[] shapes, char unitType)
      Sorts an array of shapes using the insertion sort algorithm. This method implements the insertion sort algorithm to sort the shapes in descending order based on the specified property (height, volume, or base area).
      Parameters:
      shapes - The array of Shape objects to sort
      unitType - The property to sort by (h=height, v=volume, a=base area)
      Returns:
      The sorted array of Shape objects

    • selectionSort

      public static Shape[] selectionSort(Shape[] shapes, char unitType)
      Sorts an array of shapes using the selection sort algorithm. This method implements the selection sort algorithm to sort the shapes in descending order based on the specified property (height, volume, or base area).
      Parameters:
      shapes - The array of Shape objects to sort
      unitType - The property to sort by (h=height, v=volume, a=base area)
      Returns:
      The sorted array of Shape objects

    • mergeSort

      public static Shape[] mergeSort(Shape[] shapes, char unitType, int n)
      Sorts an array of shapes using the merge sort algorithm. This method implements the merge sort algorithm to sort the shapes in descending order based on the specified property (height, volume, or base area).
      Parameters:
      shapes - The array of Shape objects to sort
      unitType - The property to sort by (h=height, v=volume, a=base area)
      Returns:
      The array of Shape objects (currently unsorted)

    • merge

    • printSortedShapes

      public static void printSortedShapes(Shape[] shapes, char unitType)
      Prints the first, last, and every 1000th element of the sorted array This method prints the array of sorted shapes to the console according to the criteria listed above.
      Parameters:
      shapes - The array of sorted Shape objects to print
      unitType - The property to print along side the name (h=height, v=volume, a=base area)
